profile:
Welcome Home.

Home Options Made Easy is a renovation company that does it all including exclusive design appointments in our brand new Design Center. Specializing in renovations, remodeling, alterations, custom build, interior design, and products. It all starts at HOME.

When you visit our showroom, our products instantly speak for themselves in their quality and appeal, but you may need a few minutes more to appreciate the services we provide. Whether you’re a DIY'er, working with a contractor, or you need us to help with every step of your project, you can count on us.

Design Services
Our in-house lead designer has a Bachelors Degree in Interior Design, and our whole team is friendly and approachable. They’re looking forward to discussing your kitchen and your ideas, and their expertise will help you to make informed decisions about cabinets, fixtures, hardware, and more to ensure everything works together seamlessly. Whatever your style, we’ll help you create a kitchen you love, from how it looks to how it flows and functions.

Renovation Contractors
Our renovation team has a collective contracting experience that exceeds 35 years. In collaboration with you, our designers, and our suppliers, we’ll transform your kitchen from everyday to exceptional.


Don't know what design works best for you? Let us put you in touch with your creative side. Maybe you know exactly what you want, we can help put those plans in motion!

We work with some of the most reputable suppliers out there, let us show you what they have to offer!

Come to visit us at 130 Saunders Rd, Unit 7, Barrie
products: We offer a full design center with beautiful options to choose from. Luxury vinyl plank flooring, tile, quartz countertops, custom color and custom designed cabinetry, fixtures for kitchen, bathrooms and laundry rooms, handles and more.

profile: Sunshine Kitchens & Cabinets was established by Peter Stacey in 1988 in Orillia to provide quality kitchen and cabinetry products and services from the Greater Toronto Area in the south to Huntsville in the north. David Stacey acquired the firm in 1994 and opened a 2,500 square foot showroom/workshop. The company has continued to specialize primarily in the residential millwork market with emphasis on new and renovated kitchens.

profile: Designers and manufacturers of premium quality kitchen and bath cabinetry.As a licenced Master Carpenter with over 37 years exp. we will also look after the complete renovation. Our goal is to improve the quality of life our customers experience  day to day.As a person who loves to cook our designs are very functional and elegant.
service_area: Central Ontario from Collingwood to Peterbourgh. Durham Region to Muskoka
products: New cabinetry  both residential and commercial. Trim work , Custom stairs and railings,complete interior and exterior renovations, bathrooms.
services: We offer the design component in your kitchen. We use many space saving hardware systems from all over the world. We can find and implement the right hardware to solve your issue.We offer our kiln to custom dry your sawn lumber and a sawmill to cut that big log from the tree grandad planted back in the day. Giving you the option for us to build the heirloom furniture to be passed down in the family from generation to generation.
brands:

Richelieu Hardware. Blanco sinks and taps,Tile master.Many other companies too numerous to mention.
specialities: We specialize in anything unique. If you can't find it anywhere else I'm sure we can design it, build it or invent it. We have a treasure trove of unique and rare locally grown  lumber that we have sawn and dried in our kiln. We also have a large quantity  of very old reclaimed material that can be turned into mantles and  flooring etc.
